title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: 40% Off All Alien Weapons
content:
GTA+ Members can take advantage of exclusive 40% discounts on the Up-N-Atomizer, Unholy Hellbringer, and Widowmaker at the Gun Van.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
